verses.verse: A Psalm of David. I will give thee <S%H2167>thanks<s%> with my whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>: Before the <S%H430>gods<s%> will I sing praises unto <S%H2167>thee<s%>.

I will <S%H7812>worship<s%> toward thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>, And give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thy <S%H8034>name<s%> for thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and for thy <S%H571>truth<s%>: For thou hast <S%H1431>magnified<s%> thy <S%H565>word<s%> above all thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H7121>called<s%> thou <S%H6030>answeredst<s%> <S%H7292>me<s%>, Thou didst encourage me with <S%H5797>strength<s%> in my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
All the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall give thee <S%H3034>thanks<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, For they have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
Yea <S%H7891><s%>, they shall sing of the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; For <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
For though <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H7311>high<s%>, yet hath he <S%H7200>respect<s%> unto the <S%H8217>lowly<s%>; But the <S%H1364>haughty<s%> he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> from <S%H4801>afar<s%>.

Though I <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>, thou wilt <S%H2421>revive<s%> <S%H7971>me<s%>; Thou wilt stretch forth thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, And thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%> will save <S%H3467>me<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H1584>perfect<s%> that which concerneth <S%H2617>me<s%>: Thy lovingkindness, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; <S%H7503>Forsake<s%> not the <S%H4639>works<s%> of thine own <S%H3027>hands<s%>.
